text: The metal knob of a gold leaf electroscope is touched with a positively charged rod. When it is taken away the leaves stay separated. Now the metal knob is touched by negatively charged rod. The separation between the leaves
hint: On touching the metal knob with a positively charged rod some electrons from the gold leaves get transferred to the rod making gold leaves positively charged and they get separated. When a negatively charged rod is touched with metal knob some negative charge flows to the gold leaves lessening the positive charge there and the separation between the leaves decreases.
